desc: Multidisciplinary teams care to facilitate GDMT implementation
Education & support to facilitate HF self-care
MRA should be discontinued if potassium cannot be maintained at <5.5 mEq/L
Titration of guideline-directed medication dosing to achieve target doses
Titration and optimization of guideline-directed medications as frequently as every 1 to 2 weeks
VHD should be managed in a multidisciplinary manner
Should have medication titrated to attain blood pressure targets
Diuretics and other guideline-directed medications should be titrated
Uptitration of GDMT to the maximally tolerated target dose
